full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 152 of 236 1056 LC3Cmax5 Parkinson - direct. 1 A. This is standing on the first floor and looking to the -- or down a hallway, and I believe you're looking to the northwest. 4 THE COURT: I'm sorry. I can't hear you, 5 Mr. Parkinson. 6 A. Looking, I believe, to the northwest. 7 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I would now like to ask 8 permission, while we keep this up on the screen, to have the 9 jurors turn in their binders to Government Exhibit 255. 10 THE COURT: Mr. Everdell, 255 is admitted already? 11 MR. EVERDELL: It is not, I believe. 12 THE COURT: Please close your binders. 13 MS. COMEY: I apologize, your Honor. I apologize, 14 your Honor. I wanted to have the witness look at 255. 15 THE COURT: Okay. The witness may look at 255. 16 A. I have examined it. 17 Q. Do you recognize that? 18 A. I do. 19 Q. What is that? 20 A. This is in the -- I believe it's the lake room looking 21 towards -- 22 THE COURT: Could you speak into the microphone, 23 please. 24 A. I believe it's in the lake room and it's looking towards 25 the garden room with a series of photos. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012666
